meta.name: UserPFP
meta.tagline: Allows you to use an animated avatar without Nitro
meta.description:
# FIND OUT HOW TO REQUEST A USERPFP [HERE](https://github.com/UserPFP/UserPFP)

Ported from [this](https://github.com/Equicord/Equicord/blob/main/src/equicordplugins/userpfp/) Equicord plugin

preferNitro.description: If both Nitro and UserPFP images are present, use the Nitro Avatar
